title: Google\Cloud\Trace\Link
name: Link
description: This plain PHP class represents a Link resource. A pointer from the current span to another span in the same trace or in a different trace. For example, this can be used in batching operations, where a single batch handler processes multiple requests from different traces or when the handler receives a request from a different project.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The relationship of the current span relative to the linked span. Defaults to TYPE_UNSPECIFIED.

params.name: options.uncompressedSizeBytes
params.description: The number of uncompressed bytes sent or received.

params.name: options.compressedSizeBytes
params.description: The number of compressed bytes sent or received. If missing assumed to be the same size as uncompressed.

methods.name: addAttributes
methods.description:
Attach labels to this span.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Trace\AttributeTrait

methods.name: addAttribute
methods.description:
Attach a single label to this span.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Trace\AttributeTrait

params.name: value
params.description: The value of the label. Will be cast to a string
